Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, south of the Ashton Bridge.
Room.LongDescription: The Ashton Bridge crosses over the Ashton River, which appears to flow to the west across Riverdell Way. To the west is the exclusive Ashton Falls Resort, reserved for only the most exclusive group of people. The entrance to the resort is off of Oceancrest Avenue.
